Project Module documentation¶

Project class¶

class pyMDMix.Project.Project(name='mdmix_project', fromfile=None, replPaths='MD', **kwargs)¶
__init__(name='mdmix_project', fromfile=None, replPaths='MD', **kwargs)¶

Constructor.

addNewSystems(systems)¶

Add systems to current project.

Parameters:systems (list) – List of System.System instances. Make sure System names are unique.
alignReplicas(replicalist, ncpus=1, steps=, []waitend=True, **kwargs)¶

Run alignment process on replicas in replicalist

Parameters:
  • replicalist (list) – List of replica instances
  • ncpus (int) – Threads to start
  • steps (list) – Steps to align. If emtpy: analyze all.
  • waitend (bool) – Wait until all alignment process is done before exiting the method
applyReplicas(action, replicalist=, []**kwargs)¶

General method to call method action with arguments in kwargs to all replicas in replicalist. If list is empty, apply to all known replicas

createGroup(groupname, replicanames)¶

Create a group of replicas for joint analysis

Parameters:
  • groupname (str) – Name to identify the group
  • replicanames (list) – Replica names to add to group
createProjectFolder()¶

Create folder structure for current project name and update paths

createQueueInputs(queue, **kwargs)¶

Create Queue input for all replicas in the project

createReplicas(systemname, settings, **kwargs)¶

Create Replicas of system with name systemname using MDSettings in settings list. Replicas will be automatically named according to the solvent and number of replicas for same solvent (e.g. ETA_1, ETA_2, WAT_1, etc.)

Parameters:
  • systemname (str) – Name of system to use. Must exist in current project (add it before calling this method with addNewSystems())
  • setttings (list) – List of MDSettings objects.
extendSimulations(replicalist, nanos)¶

Extend simulation for existing replicas.

Parameters:
  • replicalist (list) – List of Replicas.Replica instances or strings to extend.
  • nanos (int) – Number of nanoseconds to add to current replica nanoseconds.
fetchReplicas()¶

Fetch all replicas pickled files inside ProjectFolder/replPaths

fetchSystems()¶

Fetch pickled systems at project home folder

getGroup(groupname)¶

Get a list with replicas belonging to the group groupname

Parameters:groupname (str) – Name of the group to retrieve
Returns:List with Replica instances or False if group does not exists
getReplica(replicaname)¶

Return System object with name sysname. Must exists in current project folder.

getSystem(sysname)¶

Return System object with name sysname. Must exists in current project folder.

load(projfile=None)¶

Load existing project from pickled file

removeGroup(groupname)¶

Remove group. :arg str groupname: group name to be removed from project

updatePath(path=None)¶

Update main project folder path with path or current working directory if path not given. All project replica’s paths will be also updated.

This method to work requires that the expected project file (Project.projFileName) is placed inside the current working directory.

updateReplicaPaths()¶

Update replica paths with current project main path information

write()¶

Save object __dict__ to pickled file.
